name: Crumb Catcher, a video game for iPhone and iPad
blurb: A video game about beards and the simple life frustration of all the crumbs that get stuck in them.

rewards.reward: A copy of the game plus an iPad/iPhone background image of the beard of your choice!
A copy of the game plus a high-quality PDF of a papercraft beard for you to cut out and wear! Or you can just cut it out and stand it in the corner. The perfect gift for the beard-challenged!
Best Beards Club! Got a great natural beard or even a cleverly crafted fake one? We\u2019ll feature your face in perpetuity on the front page of the Beardo Games Website. Plus a copy of the game!
GIANT BEARD BATTLE STAGE! A new challenger approaches! Pick this reward and you'll get the game plus a code to unlock the first Secret Character, the twin giant beard monsters!

A copy of the game plus a Metal Mutton Chops T-Shirt. Metal Mutton Chops is Miles's favorite character so he made a special t-shirt that includes MMC's character logo, inspired by Motorhead's mascot! Metal enough to be safely worn to all manner of concerts! Available in the only true t-shirt color, black!\r\n\r\nPlease note: Outside the US? There will be an additional cost for shipping for international backers. Please contact us at info@beardogames.com for details before selecting this reward.

A copy of the game plus a copy of the bootleg version of Crumb Catcher, Krumb Katcher, a fully playable iPhone/iPad game! Sure to be pulled from the shelf sooner or later, so get your copy now! Plus, Krumb Katcher will inexplicably be available in the App Store BEFORE the game it's ripping off!

A copy of the game plus some papercraft bonuses and access to Beta testing! Be our tester and see what a game looks like before we sweep all the rough edges under the rug.  You\u2019ll get early access to the game before it\u2019s available for sale in the App Store.

A copy of the game and a limited edition Papua New Guinea Beard tiki mug available in a bunch of different colors that YOU get to choose by Munktiki (http://www.munktiki.com). The mug will come with a code to unlock the exclusive Papua New Guinea Beard character!\r\n\r\nPlease note: Outside the US? There will be an additional cost for shipping for international backers. Please contact us at info@beardogames.com for details before selecting this reward.

Your face (sortof) in the game! Chris (the programmer) will transform your face into a poorly drawn character in the game! Plus he'll put a similarly poorly drawn image of your favorite foods (three regular plus one super food), a dietary specification, and a custom animal in the game too! We'll provide you with a code to access yourself in the game and to give out to your friends. It might look a little bit like you, but just to be safe don\u2019t tell your friends until you see how it looks.You'll also get a one of a kind signed print of your portrait! Plus a copy of the game!

Your face in the Game! Miles (the artist) will transform your face into one of the characters in the game! Plus he'll put your favorite foods (three regular plus one super food), a dietary specification, and a custom animal in the game too! He\u2019ll even provide some hair augmentation to the beard-or-mustache-challenged. We'll provide you with a code to access yourself in the game and to give out to your friends. You'll also get a one of a kind signed print of your portrait! Plus a copy of the game!

We sell out and let you or your company brand one of the stages in the game. Ever wanted to know what it\u2019s like to see a video game Lumberjack eat a video game version of your brand of fast food? Now\u2019s your chance to find out! Plus a copy of the game!
